description: Defines a reference to a collection of resources.

@context.description: Tells us the type of the referenced resource object (eg. icarAnimalCoreCollection).

@id.description: Uniform resource idendentifier (URI) of the collection.

@type.description: Specifies whether this is a single resource Link or a Collection.

totalItems.description: Provides the number of items in the collection, if known.

pageSize.description: If non-zero, specifies the default number of items returned per page.

totalPages.description: Provides the number of pages in the collection, if known.

operations.description: Defines the operations that may be carried out on the collection (POST) or its members (PUT/PATCH/DELETE).
